title: Top 5 Finalist - 36-Hour Hackathon
subtitle: SynHack Hackathon - VNIT Nagpur
description: Member of a 4-person team in a 36-hour hackathon where we designed and developed a Study Material Management System. Ranked among the Top 5 teams out of 17 working on the same problem statement. Gained hands-on experience in teamwork, problem-solving, rapid prototyping, and collaborative development under time constraints.
